For all of {0}'s efforts, {0}'s wolf friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if the wolves have been brought victory, there is no one to savour the success with, neither are there any living villagers to mock at. {0} peers into the crystal ball, and silently disappears, in a cloud of fog, in search of new wolves, new allies, and new treachery to commit new crimes against humanity.
What Variant?\nCurrent: {0}\nAs you have played over 500 games you can also join:
ุฃูุช ุงูุณุงุฑู ๐! You can steal a player's role on the first night and turn that player into a villager!

By default, the Thief ๐ can steal a player's role on the first night and turn that player into a villager.\nIf the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, they get 50% chance to steal a player's role every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!

As {0} wanders around the village, they found out that there are no more fun roles available for them to steal. They quickly left this poor village and search for another village to restart their illustrious career.
Whose role do you want to steal from?

Strange... The second you start discussing on whom to convert tonight, you realize that {0} isn't here! What has happened to them??
You tried to steal a role... but your target was the serial killer! They saw you around their house, and not a minute later, you were stabbed...
The Thief, {0}, tried to steal the role from the serial killer! This didn't work out so well: {0} got stabbed multiple times and now his liver is missing...
The thief has stolen the seer's role! {0} is now the seer, and {1} does no longer have seeing abilities!

You are the Troublemaker ๐คฏ. As the teenager in the village, you're on the verge of puberty. One day, when you feel especially annoyed by everything, you can cause a huge furor and the village will lynch twice that day.
{0}, the troublemaker ๐คฏ is making trouble! Run around and scream for satisfaction! You will lynch twice today!
Because of the troublemaker, you are going to lynch twice today! Hopefully they are going to be quiet tomorrow.

You are the chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ! Your love for poisonous potions is huge and as a hobby you like to gamble with your life... Just a bit! You brew two potions, one of them being poisonous, the other neutral, looking exactly the same. Every other night, you can choose a player and force them to have a drink with you, maybe they are lucky and survive. However, if your host chooses the good drink, you'll get the poisonous one and die. Good luck!
While the other villagers are going to bed, you're still up in your laboratory, mixing the potions for the next night. Make sure to not get caught by a wolf though!
Who would be a good host and gambling partner tonight?
You went to {0}'s house to have a drink with them, however, as you arrive there, they are already dead!

You got visited by the Chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ {0}! They pulled out a knife to force you to drink, but instead of drinking, you pulled out your own knife. Apparently, your knife was stronger ๐คทโโ๏ธ
You go to {0} to let them choose a potion, however, they were the serial killer and stabbed you! ๐ช
The chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ {0} tried to force the serial killer to a game tonight. Looks like the murderer didn't feel like playing games... {0} was found, stabbed, with two potions still in their bag!
You got visited by the chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ, they forced you to choose a potion and you chose the poisonous one. What a sad way to leave this world...
You visited {0} and let them choose a potion! They chose the poisonous one and you returned home, satisfied of your gambling skills. This is no game of chances!
The chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ has visited {0} tonight and they chose the poisonous potion! While the crazy chemist is still alive, {0} died. {1}
You got visited by the chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ {0}, they forced you to choose a potion. After a moment of hesitation, you chose the good one! Lucky you!
You visited {0} and let them choose a potion! They chose the good one however! In result, you drank the poisonous one and died. Maybe you should have done a better job...
The chemist ๐จโ๐ฌ {0} was found dead! Apparently, {0} had bad luck and drank the poisonous potion during their nightly visit! Pray you never bought your medicines from them...
{0} wasn't home! You drag your suitcase back home, cursing your bad luck.

You are the Snow Wolf ๐บโ๏ธ. Every night, instead of following your pack to hunt someone, you skulk around on your own to freeze someone out of your pack. A frozen person will be unable to use any night actions, if they have any. However, your victim will have some residue of your power the next night and can not be frozen a second time in a row.

ุฐุฆุจ ุงูุซููุฌ ๐บโ๏ธ is a wolf that was native to the snowcapped mountains near the village. As such, they have mastered the art of controlling ice and snow. Having lived alone for a long time, the Snow Wolf prefers to operate alone. Instead of hunting with their pack at night, they can pick a separate victim to freeze, which causes them to be unable to use their night actions. However, they will still have some residue of the Snow Wolf's magic the next night, causing them to be immune to the Snow Wolf for one night.
Who do you want to freeze tonight?
The wolf pack consists of {0} and the Snow Wolf {1}
{0} has died, and you transform into an Alpha wolf. Your teammates are: {1} and the Snow Wolf {2}
{0} has died, and you transform into the Wolf Cub. Your teammates are: {1} and the Snow Wolf {2}
{0} has died, and you transform into a Werewolf. Your teammates are: {1} and the Snow Wolf {2}
{0} has died, and you transform into the Lycan. Your teammates are: {1} and the Snow Wolf {2}
{0} has died, and you transform into the Snow Wolf. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become the new snow wolf!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become a werewolf! Your new teammates are: {1} and the Snow Wolf {2}
{0} is no longer your teammate and {1} has now become the new snow wolf!

As you opened the door to leave your house, a gust of wind blew towards you, causing you to freeze in your tracks ๐บโ๏ธ. You stand frozen in the doorway, silently cursing this weird form of bondage. Ah well, thank goodness you're thawed now.

As you stirred in your sleep, preparing to wake up to get your potions, a strong gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze ๐บโ๏ธ. From the corner of your eyes, you saw the bottles of your potions frosted over. Looks like they didn't escape the brunt of the freezing spell either. You mentally sighed, wishing the sun came up sooner... Good thing you're thawed now, though

As you donned your cloak and prepared to leave your house, a gust of wind blew in from the doorway, causing you to freeze ๐บโ๏ธ. Your fellow cultists dropped by soon after to bring you along to cult people, but they ended up laughing at your demise. Leaving you by the doorway, they promised that they'll make good work of tonight. Now that you're unfrozen, you leave the house, cringing in embarrassment.

As you grabbed your sword, a gust of wind blew in from the window, causing you to freeze, back still arched ๐บโ๏ธ. You mentally groaned, your limbs aching from being in this position until now...

ุนูุฏู ุง ุจุฏุฃุช ุจูุชุญ ุฃุฌูุญุชู, a gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze ๐บโ๏ธ. You inwardly cringed as you suddenly imagine yourself as an ornament on a Christmas tree. Thankfully, this is now over since the sun has risen.
